alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 8:05PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Cheyenne and southwestern Kit Carson Counties in east central Colorado through 900 PM MDT... At 804 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Flagler to Karval. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Flagler around 810 PM MDT. Wild Horse around 850 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 390 and 397. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
